short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Syncs YNAB account balances with ProjectionLab. Allows you to grow beyond Rule 4 with detailed projections and tax models.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Keep your financial projections up to date! As a person who uses both YNAB and ProjectionLab you have likely spent a good amount of time keeping your account values in sync manually.

This tool uses the YNAB API to help you update your ProjectionLab account values in a few clicks! The setup is simple:

1) Authorize your YNAB account.
2) Map YNAB accounts to ProjectionLab accounts.
3) Preview the new amounts before clicking "Sync Now".

On future syncs the extension will remember your preferences, so you can skip straight to "Sync Now" unless you've changed accounts!
